storagePolicyName.description: Storage Policy Based Management (SPBM) profile name.

fsType.description: Filesystem type to mount. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. Ex. "ext4", "xfs", "ntfs". Implicitly inferred to be "ext4" if unspecified.

storagePolicyID.description: Storage Policy Based Management (SPBM) profile ID associated with the StoragePolicyName.

volumePath.description: Path that identifies vSphere volume vmdk
